forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. Low around 20, with temperatures rising to around 25 overnight. Southwest wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow and a slight chance of freezing drizzle between 7am and 1pm. Mostly cloudy. High near 34, with temperatures falling to around 30 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 6 to 10 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

forecast.name: Saturday Night
forecast.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Light Snow
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of snow after 4am. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 22. West southwest wind 1 to 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of around one inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: Snow. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 30. Southwest wind 1 to 9 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New snow accumulation of around one inch possible.

Huron Meadows Metropark (Brighton).conditions: Still great as of this (Friday) morning. Hawk hills a little rough some dirt and vegetation showing through in parts- but skiable. Coyote run and contractors in great shape!

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs Nob is not yet open for its down hill program : coming this weekend . But the groomers jumped the gun on the Nordic Trails . Access through Valley road to the red and blue loops are currently primo !

nubsNob.xcTrails: All trails will be open this Saturday and Sunday. We are packing the trails every morning to improve conditions. Expect very good conditions this weekend.
nubsNob.comments: Nub's Nob will open tomorrow and Sunday for the first two days of the ski season! We anticipate having 12 runs open which includes almost every run on our frontside with the exception of Scarface, Chute and Twilight Zone. We will have 3 chairlifts (Purple, Green, Yellow) open along with the rope tow and Space Worm. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM. See you on Saturday! We will be open daily for skiing and riding beginning on December 12.
